comments: I took Prof Banerjee in the Summer II 2016 and he was great. Take him you\'ll love how he teaches, what to expect on his lecture exams and show you some simple methods that you\'ll like. He does write all over the board but boy does he teach well. I recommend yall take him . If he teached chem 131 I would\'ve taken him but unfortunately he doesn\'t

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I loved Professor Soojay Banerjee because he was a nice professor. He let use our Book and Notes on all our Tests during the Spring 2011 Semester at Montgomery College: Rockville.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: At first, I was skeptical about him. But after the course was over, I learned to LOVE him! He is fast, yes. And he does write all over the board, BUT he DOES teach and explains things well. He taught us tricks and methods that really help for CHEM131. I wish he taught all my future chem courses. I would DEF recommend Prof. Banerjee for chem!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I am a mature student and now I really like Chemistry. I wish he taught the next course for Chemistry.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He goes way too fast with the lectures. Not a clear direct format when he teaches either he just scribbles all over the white board.U have 2 options either you decide to listen only or copy what he writes down which dont even make sense what ur copying. hes nice though,personality wise. funny too with his accent. but personally I dont recommend him

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)

comments: I do not recommend taking him, he goes wayyy too fast, and its suppose to feel like a pre chem class felt like a hard core advanced class. and im an A student so im not stupid. hes just not good teacher.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Prof Bana is cool. Very funny, breaks things down so you can understand them. Attendance is not mandatory but if you are not the type to learn on your own, do attend.He will always explain things the easier way. Plus its never a long boring class. No waste of time. If everybody gets it. Its a wrap. Time to go home. Take him, only him! GOT AN A!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This teacher is awesome! Very enjoyable class. He is funny! Attendance was not mandatory but You do not wanna miss any of his interesting classes.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great professor in all aspects. Interesting, crystal clear lectures and examples. Attendance not mandatory, no homework or quizzes, only 4 20 question multiple choice exams that are open note, open book. If you want an easy A but to also really understand the basics of chem, take Banerjee.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Soojay is awesome. He is extremely knowledgeable about the subject and better yet, he knows how to explain it so that anyone can understand it...and enjoy it. It\'s a class that many people may have to take if they haven\'t taken Chem in a few years. If its mando, might as well take it with him!!!

comments: This man is so awsome.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!! he is a good professor

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: he is awesome! i\'ve never experienced a class like his, likewise, i never had a teacher like him. he goes through everything, makes sures you know the material, and he gives lots of reviews before the exams. i wish he taught more class like chem 101 or chem 102! im sad he doesnt!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great teacher. I loved his class. I wish all of the teachers were like him. Makes sure that you understand the subject. I loved the way he handles the hard to teach portions of the course. I wish he teaches more Chem courses at MC.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His class was completely useless. I\'ve moved on the Chem 101 and I feel like I don\'t know anything I should.
